00024 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00025 /// CTreeNodeEditor::CTreeNodeEditor
00026 ///
00027 /// @description    This is the default constructor for the CTreeNodeEditor
00028 ///                 class.  It initializes member variables.
00029 /// @pre            None
00030 /// @post           Member variables are initialized.
00031 ///
00032 /// @param canvas:  This is a pointer to the canvas.
00033 ///
00034 /// @limitations    None
00035 ///
00036 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00037 CTreeNodeEditor::CTreeNodeEditor( QWidget *canvas )
00038 : QObject(canvas)
00039 {
00040     m_canvas = canvas;
00041     m_isAddingChildNode = false;
00042     m_selNode = NULL;
00043     m_oldParent = NULL;
00044 
00045     //Setup the line edit used for editing node history values.
00046     m_historyEdit = new QLineEdit( m_canvas );
00047     m_historyEdit->setAlignment( Qt::AlignCenter );
00048     m_historyEdit->hide();
00049     connect( m_historyEdit, SIGNAL( editingFinished() ), this,
00050              SLOT( historyDone() ) );
00051 
00052     //Setup the line edit used for editing node names.
00053     m_nameEdit = new QLineEdit( m_canvas );
00054     m_nameEdit->setAlignment( Qt::AlignCenter );
00055     m_nameEdit->hide();
00056     connect( m_nameEdit, SIGNAL( editingFinished() ), this,
00057              SLOT( nameDone() ) );
00058 
00059     //Setup the line edit used for editing node values.
00060     m_valueEdit = new QLineEdit( m_canvas );
00061     m_valueEdit->setAlignment( Qt::AlignCenter );
00062     m_valueEdit->hide();
00063     connect( m_valueEdit, SIGNAL( editingFinished() ), this,
00064              SLOT( valueDone() ) );
00065 
00066     //Setup actions and menus.
00067     setupActions();
00068     setupMenus();
00069 }

00084 }

00086 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00087 /// CTreeNodeEditor::addChildClicked
00088 ///
00089 /// @description  This function is called when the user selects to add a child
00090 ///               node.  It modifies the boolean variable indicating a child
00091 ///               node is being added so mouse move events are captured.
00092 /// @pre          None
00093 /// @post         None
00094 ///
00095 /// @limitations  None
00096 ///
00097 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00098 void CTreeNodeEditor::addChildClicked()
00099 {
00100     m_isAddingChildNode = true;
00101 }
00102 
00103 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00104 /// CTreeNodeEditor::addChildDone
00105 ///
00106 /// @description   This function is used to indicate that the used has placed
00107 ///                the new child node which is being added and creates the
00108 ///                child node at the indicated point.
00109 /// @pre           None
00110 /// @post          A new child node is added to the previously selected node at
00111 ///                the given point.
00112 ///
00113 /// @param point:  This point is where the new child node is to be placed.
00114 ///
00115 /// @limitations   None
00116 ///
00117 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00118 void CTreeNodeEditor::addChildDone( QPoint point )
00119 {
00120     m_model->addChildNode( m_selNode, point );
00121     m_selNode = NULL;
00122     m_isAddingChildNode = false;
00123 }
00124 
00125 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00126 /// CTreeNodeEditor::addParentClicked
00127 ///
00128 /// @description  This function is called when the user selects to add a new
00129 ///               parent node.  It adds the new parent node to the previously
00130 ///               selected node.
00131 /// @pre          None
00132 /// @post         The previously selected node is given a new parent node
00133 ///               which is in turn made a child node of the previously parent
00134 ///               node.
00135 ///
00136 /// @limitations  None
00137 ///
00138 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00139 void CTreeNodeEditor::addParentClicked()
00140 {
00141     m_model->addParentNode( m_selNode );
00142     m_selNode = NULL;
00143 }
00144 
00145 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00146 /// CTreeNodeEditor::canvasContextEvent
00147 ///
00148 /// @description   This function handles context menu events.  If the user
00149 ///                clicked on a node, the node context menu is executed and
00150 ///                true is returned.  Otherwise, false is returned.
00151 /// @pre           None
00152 /// @post          None
00153 ///
00154 /// @param e:      This is a pointer to the QContextMenuEvent which determines
00155 ///                where the user clicked.
00156 ///
00157 /// @return bool:  Returns true if the user clicked on a node and the node
00158 ///                context menu is executed and false otherwise.
00159 ///
00160 /// @limitations   None
00161 ///
00162 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00163 bool CTreeNodeEditor::canvasContextEvent( QContextMenuEvent *e )
00164 {
00165     if ( m_oldParent != NULL )
00166         return true;
00167 
00168     //Find if the user clicked on a node or not.
00169     m_selNode = m_model->findNode( e->pos() );
00170 
00171     //Check if a node was found at the point the user selected.
00172     if ( m_selNode != NULL )
00173     {
00174         //Set the checked value for the Quiescent menu option to properly
00175         //reflect the node which was clicked on.
00176         m_nodeQuiescentAction->setChecked( m_selNode->s_quiescent );
00177 
00178         //Set the unhook node to disabled if the node is the root node.
00179         m_nodeUnhookAction->setDisabled( m_selNode->s_parent == NULL );
00180 
00181         //Pop up the node context menu.
00182         m_nodeMenu->exec( e->globalPos() );
00183         return true;
00184     }
00185     return false;
00186 }
00187 
00188 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00189 /// CTreeNodeEditor::canvasMouseEvent
00190 ///
00191 /// @description   This function handles mouse events.
00192 /// @pre           None
00193 /// @post          None
00194 ///
00195 /// @param e:      This is a pointer to the QMouse event.
00196 ///
00197 /// @return bool:  Returns true if the mouse event is used and false otherwise.
00198 ///
00199 /// @limitations   None
00200 ///
00201 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00202 bool CTreeNodeEditor::canvasMouseEvent( QMouseEvent *e )
00203 {
00204     switch( e->type() )
00205     {
00206     case QEvent::MouseButtonPress:
00207         return ( isAddingChildNode() || m_oldParent != NULL );
00208     case QEvent::MouseMove:
00209         //Check if a child node is being added or a node is being moved.
00210         if ( isAddingChildNode() || m_oldParent != NULL )
00211         {
00212             //Update the position and repaint the canvas.
00213             m_curPoint = e->pos();
00214             if ( m_oldParent != NULL )
00215             {
00216                 m_model->editSubTreePosition( m_selNode, ( e->pos() +
00217                     QPoint(0, CStyleToolkit::instance()->getNodeRadius()*3 )));
00218             }
00219             m_canvas->repaint();
00220             return true;
00221         }
00222         return false;
00223     case QEvent::MouseButtonRelease:
00224         //Check if a child node is being added.
00225         if ( isAddingChildNode() )
00226         {
00227             //Add the child node at the indicated position.
00228             addChildDone( e->pos() );
00229             return true;
00230         }
00231         else if ( m_oldParent != NULL )
00232         {
00233             unhookDone( e->pos() );
00234             return true;
00235         }
00236         else
00237             return false;
00238     default:
00239         return false;
00240     }
00241     return false;
00242 }
00243

00246 ///
00247 /// @description  This function is called when a user selects the option to
00248 ///               delete a node.  It deletes the selected node and all its
00249 ///               children.

00254 ///
00255 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00256 void CTreeNodeEditor::deleteNodeClicked()
00257 {
00258     m_model->deleteNode( m_selNode );
00259     m_selNode = NULL;
00260 }

00262 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00263 /// CTreeNodeEditor::editHistoryClicked
00264 ///
00265 /// @description     This function is called when a user clicks on the edit
00266 ///                  history value option.  It pops up the line edit for editing
00267 ///                  values to allow the user to type in the new history value
00268 ///                  for the node.
00269 /// @pre             None
00270 /// @post            None
00271 ///
00272 /// @limitations     None
00273 ///
00274 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00275 void CTreeNodeEditor::editHistoryClicked()
00276 {
00277     //Check if the selected node is NULL.  Return if it is.
00278     if ( m_selNode == NULL )
00279         return;
00280 
00281     //Set the value in the line edit to be the current value of the node.
00282     m_historyEdit->setText( QString::number( m_selNode->s_history ) );
00283     m_historyEdit->resize( m_valueEdit->sizeHint() );
00284 
00285     //Center the line edit on the node if possible, while still leaving it
00286     //fully on the canvas.
00287     int radius = CStyleToolkit::instance()->getNodeRadius();
00288     QRect ngeo( 0, 0, radius * 2, radius * 2 ), lgeo = m_valueEdit->geometry();
00289     ngeo.moveCenter( m_selNode->s_position );
00290     lgeo.moveCenter( ngeo.center() );
00291     lgeo.moveRight( qMin( lgeo.right(), m_canvas->size().width() ) );
00292     lgeo.moveLeft( qMax( lgeo.left(), 0 ) );
00293 
00294     //Show the value line edit.
00295     m_historyEdit->setGeometry( lgeo );
00296     m_historyEdit->selectAll();
00297     m_historyEdit->show();
00298     m_historyEdit->setFocus( Qt::PopupFocusReason );
00299 }
00300 
00301 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00302 /// CTreeNodeEditor::editValueClicked
00303 ///
00304 /// @description     This function is called when a user clicks on the edit
00305 ///                  value option.  It pops up the line edit for editing values
00306 ///                  to allow the user to type in the new value for the node.
00307 /// @pre             None
00308 /// @post            None
00309 ///
00310 /// @limitations     None
00311 ///
00312 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00313 void CTreeNodeEditor::editValueClicked()
00314 {
00315     //Check if the selected node is NULL.  Return if it is.
00316     if ( m_selNode == NULL )
00317         return;
00318 
00319     //Set the value in the line edit to be the current value of the node.
00320     m_valueEdit->setText( QString::number( m_selNode->s_value ) );
00321     m_valueEdit->resize( m_valueEdit->sizeHint() );
00322 
00323     //Center the line edit on the node if possible, while still leaving it
00324     //fully on the canvas.
00325     int radius = CStyleToolkit::instance()->getNodeRadius();
00326     QRect ngeo( 0, 0, radius * 2, radius * 2 ), lgeo = m_valueEdit->geometry();
00327     ngeo.moveCenter( m_selNode->s_position );
00328     lgeo.moveCenter( ngeo.center() );
00329     lgeo.moveRight( qMin( lgeo.right(), m_canvas->size().width() ) );
00330     lgeo.moveLeft( qMax( lgeo.left(), 0 ) );
00331 
00332     //Show the value line edit.
00333     m_valueEdit->setGeometry( lgeo );
00334     m_valueEdit->selectAll();
00335     m_valueEdit->show();
00336     m_valueEdit->setFocus( Qt::PopupFocusReason );
00337 }

00339 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00340 /// CTreeNodeEditor::historyDone
00341 ///
00342 /// @description  This function is called when the user is done editing the
00343 ///               history value of a node.  It saves the new value to the
00344 ///               selected node.
00345 /// @pre          None
00346 /// @post         The value of the selected node is updated.
00347 ///
00348 /// @limitations  None
00349 ///
00350 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00351 void CTreeNodeEditor::historyDone()
00352 {
00353     //Check if there is a node currently selected and return if there is none.
00354     if( m_selNode == NULL )
00355         return;
00356 
00357     m_historyEdit->hide();
00358     m_model->editNodeHistory( m_selNode, m_historyEdit->text().toInt() );
00359     m_selNode = NULL;
00360 }

00371 ///                otherwise.

00373 /// @limitations   None

00375 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00376 bool CTreeNodeEditor::isAddingChildNode()
00377 {

00379 }

00381 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00382 /// CTreeNodeEditor::isEditing
00383 ///
00384 /// @description   This function returns true if the user is editing either a
00385 ///                node name or value, and false otherwise.
00386 /// @pre           None
00387 /// @post          None
00388 ///
00389 /// @return bool:  Returns true if either the name or value line edit is visible
00390 ///                for the user to edit the appropriate value and false
00391 ///                otherwise.
00392 ///
00393 /// @limitations   None
00394 ///
00395 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00396 bool CTreeNodeEditor::isEditing()
00397 {
00398     return ( m_nameEdit->isVisible() || m_valueEdit->isVisible() );
00399 }

00401 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00402 /// CTreeNodeEditor::nameDone
00403 ///
00404 /// @description  This function is called when a user has finished editing the
00405 ///               name of a node.  It hides the line edit and saves the new
00406 ///               name of the node.
00407 /// @pre          None
00408 /// @post         The name of the selected node is updated.
00409 ///
00410 /// @limitations  None
00411 ///
00412 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00413 void CTreeNodeEditor::nameDone()
00414 {
00415     //Check if the selected node is set to NULL and return if it is.
00416     if( m_selNode == NULL )
00417         return;
00418 
00419     m_nameEdit->hide();
00420     m_model->editNodeName( m_selNode, m_nameEdit->text() );
00421     m_selNode = NULL;
00422 }
00423 
00424 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00425 /// CTreeNodeEditor::paint
00426 ///
00427 /// @description  This function paints the new child node if one is being added.
00428 /// @pre          None
00429 /// @post         The new child node is painted to the screen if one is being
00430 ///               added.
00431 ///
00432 /// @limitations  None
00433 ///
00434 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00435 void CTreeNodeEditor::paint()
00436 {
00437     //Check if a child node is being added and return if none is.
00438     if ( isAddingChildNode() )
00439     {
00440         QPainter painter( m_canvas );
00441 
00442         //Create a bounding rectangle for where the node will go.
00443         int radius = CStyleToolkit::instance()->getNodeRadius();
00444         QRect rect( 0, 0, radius * 2, radius * 2 );
00445         rect.moveCenter( m_curPoint );
00446 
00447         //Set the painter to draw the new node like a regular node, but with the
00448         //new object color.
00449         QPen pen = CStyleToolkit::instance()->getPen();
00450         pen.setColor( CStyleToolkit::instance()->getNewColor() );
00451         painter.setPen(pen);
00452         painter.setBrush( CStyleToolkit::instance()->getBrush() );
00453         painter.setRenderHint( QPainter::Antialiasing );
00454 
00455         //Draw the new node and a line connecting it to the selected node.
00456         painter.drawLine( m_selNode->s_position, m_curPoint );
00457         painter.drawEllipse( rect );
00458     }
00459     else if ( m_oldParent != NULL )
00460     {
00461         QPainter painter( m_canvas );
00462 
00463         //Set the painter to draw the new node like a regular node, but with the
00464         //new object color.
00465         QPen pen = CStyleToolkit::instance()->getPen();
00466         pen.setColor( CStyleToolkit::instance()->getNewColor() );
00467         painter.setPen(pen);
00468         painter.setBrush( CStyleToolkit::instance()->getBrush() );
00469         painter.setFont( CStyleToolkit::instance()->getFont() );
00470         painter.setRenderHint( QPainter::Antialiasing );
00471 
00472         painter.drawLine( m_selNode->s_position, m_curPoint );
00473         m_nodeArtist->paintModelHelper( m_selNode, &painter );
00474     }
00475 }
00476 
00477 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00478 /// CTreeNodeEditor::renameNodeClicked
00479 ///
00480 /// @description  This function is called when a user selects the option to
00481 ///               rename a node.  It pops up the line edit box for the selected
00482 ///               node so the user may edit the name of the node.
00483 /// @pre          None
00484 /// @post         None
00485 ///
00486 /// @limitations  None
00487 ///
00488 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00489 void CTreeNodeEditor::renameNodeClicked()
00490 {
00491     //Check if there is a node currently selected and return if there is none.
00492     if ( m_selNode == NULL )
00493         return;
00494 
00495     m_nameEdit->setText( m_selNode->s_name );
00496     m_nameEdit->resize( m_nameEdit->sizeHint() );
00497 
00498     //Center the line edit on the node if possible while keeping it on the
00499     //canvas.
00500     int radius = CStyleToolkit::instance()->getNodeRadius();
00501     QRect ngeo( 0, 0, radius * 2, radius * 2 ), lgeo = m_nameEdit->geometry();
00502     ngeo.moveCenter( m_selNode->s_position );
00503     lgeo.moveCenter( ngeo.center() );
00504     lgeo.moveRight( qMin( lgeo.right(), m_canvas->size().width() ) );
00505     lgeo.moveLeft( qMax( lgeo.left(), 0 ) );
00506 
00507     m_nameEdit->setGeometry( lgeo );
00508     m_nameEdit->selectAll();
00509     m_nameEdit->show();
00510     m_nameEdit->setFocus( Qt::PopupFocusReason );
00511 }

00548 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00549 /// CTreeNodeEditor::setQuiescentClicked
00550 ///

00568 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00569 /// CTreeNodeEditor::setupActions
00570 ///
00571 /// @description  This function initalizes all the QActions for being used in
00572 ///               the node context menu.
00573 /// @pre          None
00574 /// @post         The QAction member variables are initialized.
00575 ///
00576 /// @limitations  None
00577 ///
00578 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00579 void CTreeNodeEditor::setupActions()
00580 {
00581     m_nodeAddChildAction = new QAction( tr( "Add Child" ), this );
00582     connect( m_nodeAddChildAction, SIGNAL( triggered() ), this,
00583              SLOT( addChildClicked() ) );
00584 
00585     m_nodeAddParentAction = new QAction( tr( "Add Parent" ), this );
00586     connect( m_nodeAddParentAction, SIGNAL( triggered() ), this,
00587              SLOT( addParentClicked() ) );
00588 
00589     m_nodeDeleteAction = new QAction( tr( "Delete" ), this );
00590     connect( m_nodeDeleteAction, SIGNAL( triggered() ), this,
00591              SLOT( deleteNodeClicked() ) );
00592 
00593     m_nodeEditValueAction = new QAction( tr( "Edit Value" ), this );
00594     connect( m_nodeEditValueAction, SIGNAL( triggered() ), this,
00595              SLOT( editValueClicked() ) );
00596 
00597     m_nodeEditHistoryAction = new QAction( tr( "Edit History Value" ), this );
00598     connect( m_nodeEditHistoryAction, SIGNAL( triggered() ), this,
00599              SLOT( editHistoryClicked() ) );
00600     
00601     m_nodeQuiescentAction = new QAction( tr( "Quiescent" ), this );
00602     m_nodeQuiescentAction->setCheckable( true );
00603     connect( m_nodeQuiescentAction, SIGNAL( triggered( bool ) ), this,
00604              SLOT(setQuiescentClicked( bool ) ) );
00605 
00606     m_nodeRenameAction = new QAction( tr( "Rename" ), this );
00607     connect( m_nodeRenameAction, SIGNAL( triggered() ), this,
00608              SLOT( renameNodeClicked() ) );
00609 
00610     m_nodeUnhookAction = new QAction( tr( "Unhook Node" ), this );
00611     connect( m_nodeUnhookAction, SIGNAL( triggered() ), this,
00612              SLOT( unhookClicked() ) );
00613 }
00614 
00615 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00616 /// CTreeNodeEditor::setupMenus
00617 ///
00618 /// @description  This function initializes the node context menu.
00619 /// @pre          None
00620 /// @post         The node context menu is initalized.
00621 ///
00622 /// @limitations  None
00623 ///
00624 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00625 void CTreeNodeEditor::setupMenus()
00626 {
00627     m_nodeMenu = new QMenu( "Node menu", m_canvas );
00628     m_nodeMenu->addAction( m_nodeAddChildAction );
00629     m_nodeMenu->addAction( m_nodeAddParentAction );
00630     m_nodeMenu->addAction( m_nodeRenameAction );
00631     m_nodeMenu->addAction( m_nodeEditValueAction );
00632     m_nodeMenu->addAction( m_nodeEditHistoryAction );
00633     m_nodeMenu->addAction( m_nodeQuiescentAction );
00634     m_nodeMenu->addAction( m_nodeDeleteAction );
00635     m_nodeMenu->addAction( m_nodeUnhookAction );
00636 }

00638 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00639 /// CTreeNodeEditor::unhookClicked
00640 ///
00641 /// @description  This function is called whenever a user clicks on the
00642 ///               unhook option for a node.  It unhooks the node from the graph.
00643 /// @pre          None
00644 /// @post         The currently selected node is unhooked from the graph.
00645 ///
00646 /// @limitations  None
00647 ///
00648 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00649 void CTreeNodeEditor::unhookClicked()
00650 {
00651     //Save the old parent in case the user cancels the node moving.
00652     m_oldParent = m_selNode->s_parent;
00653     m_model->unhook( m_selNode );
00654 }
00655 
00656 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00657 /// CTreeNodeEditor::unhookDone
00658 ///
00659 /// @description   This function is called when the user selects a point to end
00660 ///                the moving of an unhooked node.  If a valid node is selected,
00661 ///                the unhooked node is reattached to the graph as a child of
00662 ///                the selected node.  If no node is selected, the unhooked
00663 ///                node is reattached to its old parent node.
00664 /// @pre           None
00665 /// @post          The unhooked node is reattached to the graph.
00666 ///
00667 /// @param point:  This is the point where the user clicked to reattach the
00668 ///                unhooked node.
00669 ///
00670 /// @limitations   None
00671 ///
00672 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00673 void CTreeNodeEditor::unhookDone( QPoint point )
00674 {
00675     STreeNode *newParent = m_model->findNode( point );
00676 
00677     //Check if a new parent node was selected.  If not, use the old parent node.
00678     if ( newParent == NULL )
00679         newParent = m_oldParent;
00680     m_model->rehook( newParent, m_selNode );
00681     m_oldParent = NULL;
00682     m_selNode = NULL;
00683 }
00684 
00685 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00686 /// CTreeNodeEditor::valueDone
00687 ///
00688 /// @description  This function is called when the user is done editing the
00689 ///               value of node.  It saves the new value to the selected node.
00690 /// @pre          None
00691 /// @post         The value of the selected node is updated.
00692 ///
00693 /// @limitations  None
00694 ///
00695 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00696 void CTreeNodeEditor::valueDone()
00697 {
00698     //Check if there is a node currently selected and return if there is none.
00699     if( m_selNode == NULL )
00700         return;
00701 
00702     m_valueEdit->hide();
00703     m_model->editNodeValue( m_selNode, m_valueEdit->text().toFloat() );
00704     m_selNode = NULL;
00705 }
